summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 264 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 979 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), inside temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 264.4m lower than yesterday, 93.6m lower than the past week, 979.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1722.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Moderate rainfall, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
